      • setSizeBy

        public void setSizeBy​(java.lang.String sizeBy)
        Whether the bubble legend range value should be represented by the area or the width of the bubble. The defaults, area, corresponds best to the human perception of the size of each bubble.

        Try it:

         •  Size by width

      • getSizeBy

        public java.lang.String getSizeBy()

      • setLegendIndex

        public void setLegendIndex​(java.lang.Number legendIndex)
        The position of the bubble legend in the legend.

        Try it:

         •  Bubble legend as last item in legend

      • setSizeByAbsoluteValue

        public void setSizeByAbsoluteValue​(java.lang.Boolean sizeByAbsoluteValue)
        When this is true, the absolute value of z determines the size of the bubble. This means that with the defaults zThreshold of 0, a bubble of value -1 will have the same size as a bubble of value 1, while a bubble of value 0 will have a smaller size according to minSize.

      • getSizeByAbsoluteValue

        public java.lang.Boolean getSizeByAbsoluteValue()

      • setClassName

        public void setClassName​(java.lang.String className)
        An additional class name to apply to the bubble legend' circle graphical elements. This option does not replace defaults class names of the graphical element.

        Try it:

         •  Styling by CSS

      • getClassName

        public java.lang.String getClassName()

      • setRanges

        public void setRanges​(java.util.ArrayList ranges)
        Options for specific range. One range consists of bubble, label and connector.

        Try it:

         •  Manually defined ranges
         •  Auto calculated ranges

      • getRanges

        public java.util.ArrayList getRanges()

      • setMaxSize

        public void setMaxSize​(java.lang.Number maxSize)
        Miximum bubble legend range size. If values for ranges are not specified, the minSize and the maxSize are calculated from bubble series.

      • getMaxSize

        public java.lang.Number getMaxSize()

      • setMinSize

        public void setMinSize​(java.lang.Number minSize)
        Minimum bubble legend range size. If values for ranges are not specified, the minSize and the maxSize are calculated from bubble series.

      • getMinSize

        public java.lang.Number getMinSize()

        public void setConnectorClassName​(java.lang.String connectorClassName)

        Try it:

         •  Styling by CSS

        public void setZThreshold​(java.lang.Number zThreshold)

        public java.lang.Number getZThreshold()

      • setConnectorDistance

        public void setConnectorDistance​(java.lang.Number connectorDistance)
        The length of the connectors in pixels. If labels are centered, the distance is reduced to 0.

        Try it:

         •  Increased connector length
